titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2707) to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to provide for more effective assistance in response to major disasters and emergencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-518.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/16/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2707 (disaster relief).
